title: Best Buy is running a $50 discount on a popular Roomba robot vacuum right now, bringing its price down to $280
text:
Best Buy

Cleaning can be a real pain. Sure, the result is that you have a clean home, but the actual act of cleaning can be a chore that you may just not have time for. If that sounds like you, then it's worth considering a robot vacuum. One of the better robot vacuums, the iRobot Roomba 675, is currently available for a discount straight from Best Buy.

There are a few reasons you might want a robot vacuum — like, for example, the fact that your floors could always just be clean. You can program these vacuums to work when you leave the house, meaning that you'll never have to see them actually clean — you'll just arrive home and the vacuum will have worked while you were gone.

The iRobot Roomba in particular has a lot to offer. The device comes with multi-surface brushes, meaning that it can be used to clean carpets, hard floors, and so on. It has a three-stage cleaning system to ensure that it's thorough, and it has a battery that allows it to run for up to a hefty 90 minutes on a single charge — so it should have more than enough juice to clean your entire house. The device will even work with Google Assistant and Amazon Alexa, meaning that you can integrate it with the rest of your smart home setup.

While the iRobot Roomba 675 normally comes at $329.99, it's been discounted by $50 from Best Buy — so you can get it for $279.99 for a limited time. It's also available on Amazon for the same price.
description: iRobot's Roomba is one of the most well known robot vacuum brands on the market. For a limited time, the Roomba 675 is discounted by $50 at Best Buy.
